name: Refraction (itch) (7swell)
description:
Experience being a space soldier and being attacked by an unknown species of aliens with a lot of crystals. Play through 3 levels of intense alien killing. Your arsenal of guns will have you blast through the aliens to escape your impending doom. Starting in the upper part of the ship you fight your way to the lower part of the ship (level 2). Then grab an escape pod to go down to your final destination to wipe them out. Good Luck Solider. 

Controls:

G -  grenade

R - Reload

Q -  weapon wheel

Esc -  menu

Left click -  stab/shoot

right click - sniper special skill / pistol skill (charge) / Shotgun skill (charge)/full auto

space bar - Jump and double jump
